tool.name: Normalize to input
tool.help:
This tool produces 2 output files, one that is the normalized absolute difference between the signal and input:
Z(signal-input)
and one that is the normalize relative difference:
Z(Log2(signal/input))
If multiple replicates are provided, they are averaged after computing the absolute and relative differences for each replicate as above.
